RumorFact.Text: "With a view of the wilds, the final clue does hide, sheltered from the hungry void, safe on the other side"

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai recording on the White Hole Station. It gave me a final clue to find the Visitor, "I've enjoyed watching your search from above, hidden in plain sight, find me with the help of your satellite and unstable star, don't be a stranger!"
